keyMoments.title: Assists in Covering Whitebeard's Body
keyMoments.description: The Blackbeard Pirates help their captain cover Whitebeard's corpse with a large black curtain, facilitating Teach's mysterious power extraction process.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's coordinated action enables one of the most significant power acquisitions in One Piece history.

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Blackbeard's Dual Devil Fruit Power
keyMoments.description: The crew lifts the black cloth to reveal Blackbeard with his newly acquired dual Devil Fruit abilities, completing their captain's master plan.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the Blackbeard Pirates' transformation into one of the most dangerous crews in the world with a captain possessing unprecedented powers.

keyMoments.title: Supports Blackbeard's Declaration of New Era
keyMoments.description: The crew stands behind Blackbeard as he declares his era has begun, positioning themselves as major players in the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Blackbeard Pirates as a crew that will play a major role in the future conflicts of One Piece.

jollyRoger.description: Three skulls with crossbones behind them, representing Blackbeard's unusual physiology
